Description.Text: Facilities Travellers can feel at home in one of the 126 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, a newspaper stand, room service and a conference room. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Travellers can buy souvenirs at the gift shop. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the resort. Rooms Rooms feature a bathroom. Features include a tea/coffee station, internet access and WiFi. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. The complex offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the swimming pool is a great way to cool off on hot days. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. Active guests can choose from a range of leisure activities, including a spa, a sauna, massage treatments and hydrotherapy applications.
